item.title: By: gev
item.dc:creator: gev
item.description: Hehe, I thought Anon was just a guy who responded to every one of your posts and always had something to say. How wrong and dumb I was! Didn't know it was short for Anonymous.
item.content:encoded: Hehe, I thought Anon was just a guy who responded to every one of your posts and always had something to say. How wrong and dumb I was! Didn’t know it was short for Anonymous.

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description:
/grin
Dunno man, the people demand more Guild Wars anecdotes! . . . well, *I'm* hoping to hear that it picks up after lush newbie-pre-Searing land.
item.content:encoded:
/grin

Dunno man, the people demand more Guild Wars anecdotes! . . . well, *I’m* hoping to hear that it picks up after lush newbie-pre-Searing land.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Weeeeee, and down the rabbit hole we go!
First I heard of this mysterious server transfer of a Warcraft guild (the link in the 7:25 pm comment ... which leads to 38 other links about what maybe happened and what the Blizzard Collective is telling everyone to SHUT UP ABOUT, OMG DON'T TALK ABOUT THIS, IT'S PRIVATE).
So, will take me the rest of the night to figure out what maybe happened and then another five minutes to point out the obvious, for which I will take full credit, obviously.
Good news hound work tho, Anonymous! AFK Gamer could use an unpaid summer intern like you!
And to think I was going to write a little snippet about how much difference a day can make with Guild Wars and that I might not hate that game after all.
NO TIME FOR THAT NOW. We're on a full drama alert, people!
item.content:encoded:
Weeeeee, and down the rabbit hole we go!

First I heard of this mysterious server transfer of a Warcraft guild (the link in the 7:25 pm comment … which leads to 38 other links about what maybe happened and what the Blizzard Collective is telling everyone to SHUT UP ABOUT, OMG DON’T TALK ABOUT THIS, IT’S PRIVATE).

So, will take me the rest of the night to figure out what maybe happened and then another five minutes to point out the obvious, for which I will take full credit, obviously.

Good news hound work tho, Anonymous! AFK Gamer could use an unpaid summer intern like you!

And to think I was going to write a little snippet about how much difference a day can make with Guild Wars and that I might not hate that game after all.

NO TIME FOR THAT NOW. We’re on a full drama alert, people!

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description:
More richness - apparently this Uther guild moved to Eldre'Thalas due to being on the receiving end of harassment. They have a site here: http://apathy.brokentoys.org/ which sort of implies a relation to http://www.brokentoys.org/ here (aka Lum the Mad, who's now working for Mythic).
Curiouser and curiouser.
item.content:encoded:
More richness – apparently this Uther guild moved to Eldre’Thalas due to being on the receiving end of harassment. They have a site here: http://apathy.brokentoys.org/ which sort of implies a relation to http://www.brokentoys.org/ here (aka Lum the Mad, who’s now working for Mythic).

Curiouser and curiouser.

item.title: By: The Alien
item.dc:creator: The Alien
item.description: While it was funny, it was also pretty stupid. Spitting on a GM telling you to knock it off is like flipping off a bouncer telling you to cool it at a nightclub. The same sort of people would probably be complaining "You can't do this! I didn't go anything wrong! My cover charge pays your salary! This is an abuse of power!" while being tossed out the front door. Of course, everyone else in the club is laughing at the idiot getting the treatment
item.content:encoded: While it was funny, it was also pretty stupid. Spitting on a GM telling you to knock it off is like flipping off a bouncer telling you to cool it at a nightclub. The same sort of people would probably be complaining “You can’t do this! I didn’t go anything wrong! My cover charge pays your salary! This is an abuse of power!” while being tossed out the front door. Of course, everyone else in the club is laughing at the idiot getting the treatment

item.content:encoded: Normaly RPers make my skin crawl, but this was pretty funny.
